title: How to Set Up AI Phone Answering
description: Never miss a call again. Let AI answer, qualify leads, and book appointments 24/7.
requirements: A computer to set up the service
Your typical service offerings and pricing ranges

steps.title: Choose an AI phone answering service
steps.description: Several options exist at different price points.
substeps: Smith.ai: $140/month for 20 calls — human-AI hybrid, high quality
Goodcall.ai: ~$50/month — fully AI, built for local businesses
Slang.ai: Pay per call — newer, AI-first
steps.tip: Start with Goodcall.ai for best value. Smith.ai if quality matters most.

steps.title: Sign up and verify your number
steps.description: Connect your existing phone number to the service.
substeps: Create an account on your chosen platform
Choose: Forward all calls, forward only missed calls, or new number
steps.tip: Start with 'forward missed calls only' to test without changing your workflow.

steps.title: Set up your greeting and business info
steps.description: Tell the AI how to represent your business.
substeps: Write a short description of what you do

steps.title: Configure qualifying questions
steps.description: Help the AI gather the info you need from callers.
substeps: How did they hear about you?
steps.tip: Don't ask too many questions — 4-5 is the sweet spot before people hang up.

steps.title: Set up appointment booking (optional)
steps.description: Let the AI schedule directly to your calendar.
substeps: Connect your Google Calendar or Calendly

steps.title: Set up notifications
steps.description: Get alerted immediately when leads come in.
substeps: Set up a daily summary if available
Test by calling your own number

successMessage: Your AI receptionist is live! Missed calls now become captured leads.
proTips: Review call transcripts weekly and refine your AI's responses
Update the AI with common objections and how to handle them
Consider a dedicated business line so personal calls don't go through
